short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always show a Twitter user page with_replies, which shows the user's full feed. The opposite of the 'Hide Twitter Replies' extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that scratched an itch of mine. When clicking a user's profile, I typically want to view a user's full feed and this extension will load the "with_replies" page when going to the user's page.

Please post any issues https://github.com/HyShai/with_replies

12/2/14: Fixed bug with following/followers/mentions/favorites pages. If there are any more "special" pages that I missed please let me know.

12/16/14: Fixed bug with sessions page. If there are any more "special" pages that I missed please let me know.
